title: vIkSitOham dhanyOham
sahitya:
vIkSitOham dhanyOham 
			(madhyamakAla)
vEgavara tanaya kamala nayanEna vidhinuta hari pada vimala hrdayEna iha


anupallavi

  sAkSi bhUta tapana sanga varENa sarvadA shrI rAma nAma smaraNEna 
			(madhyamakAla)
janaka sutA shishira vacana pAtra calita gagana vara sAdhu mitrENa iha


caraNam   Atanka mukha valee tanayAdi atirava vIragaNa Anata padEna  
sAdhaka viha sama tAraka pAThanEna dAnava kula bhIkara mukha varENa 
			(madhyamakAla)
samudita madhuvana sanga tungEna dasharatha dvitanaya sankaTa harENa 
sumukha bhakti viracita vacanEna sulabha manOhara sukrta tapasEna iha
